sentences.sContent: Using a whisk, mix the yolks and sugar to a smooth paste.
sentences.sCn: 用搅拌器将蛋黄和糖搅打成均匀的糊状。

trans.tranOther: to mix liquid, eggs etc very quickly so that air is mixed in, using a fork or a whisk
a small kitchen tool made of curved pieces of wire, used for mixing air into eggs, cream etc
